paper_type.rationale: Interpretive/hermeneutic analysis of Homeric epic. Uses close reading and textual analysis to advance historical-linguistic claims about proto-Panhellenic identity.

research_approach.rationale: Builds argument inductively from textual evidence (17 primary sources), reasoning from patterns in text to broader conclusions about 8th-century BCE Greek identity formation. Some abductive inference to best explanation.

framework_assignment.rationale: Humanistic scholarship without computational methods. Reproducibility assessed via Methodological Transparency variant (interpretive adequacy, not computational reproducibility).

special_considerations.variant_reason: Non-computational humanistic research; textual analysis and close reading methods
